calculationBasisDescription: You can find the calculation basis in a separate document on the <Link>project web page.</Link>
changeCountryConfirmation: Changing your country requires you to retake the test. Are you sure?

error.brokenCalculation: Uh-oh, we seem to have problems with our formulas. Try again or get support.
error.general: Oops, something went wrong. Try again, ask a friend or get support.
error.invalidEmail: The email is invalid. Check for typos and unusual characters.
error.magicLinVerificationFailed: Magic link verification failed, please verify you are using the latest magic link in your email, or try again
error.noInternet: Seems like you lost connection to Internet. Reconnect and try again.

footer.title: How did you like the test?

feedback.hamburgerMenu: We would love to hear your feedback at <Link>info@pslifestyle.eu</Link>.

fundingInfo: This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement No 101037342.

notifications.sessionExpired: Your session has expired, please log in again!

pageNotFoundExplanation: Seems that we can not find the page you are looking for. You might have navigated to an url that does not exist. Go back or try using one of the buttons to get to safety!
productionBanner: Welcome to the new Lifestyle test! We welcome your feedback at <bolder>info@pslifestyle.eu</bolder> .
retakeTestConfirmation: Are you sure you want to retake the test?
userAnswerLoadingError: There was an issue while loading your answers.
userPlanLoadingError: There was an issue while loading your plan.
waitLoading: Wait a minute as we load content...
